snippet: Marcel Kittel won the 10th stage of the Tour de France to become the first rider in this year’s Tour to win two stages.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel won the 10th stage of the Tour de France to become the first rider in this year’s Tour to win two stages.

headline.main: Britain’s Froome Avoids Danger and Holds On to Yellow Jersey
headline.print_headline: Britain’s Froome Avoids Danger And Holds On to Yellow Jersey
